GENERAL_Extension_Description.message: Kleine Hilfe für www.save.tv. Versteckt unerwünschte Einträge (Serien, Filme, etc.) für eine bessere Übersicht.

GENERAL_ContextMenuMainItem_Title.description: Title of the context-menu main item (to hide all the titles).

POPUP_OptionsButton_TextContent.description: The button to go to the options page.

OPTIONS_LoadButton_TextContent.description: TextContent of the button to (up)load a file of saved entries.

OPTIONS_SaveButton_TextContent.description: TextContent of the button to save/download the list of (saved) entries.

OPTIONS_ClearButton_TextContent.description: TextContent of the button to clear the list of saved entries.

OPTIONS_LoadReadButton_TextContent.description: TextContent of the button to 'read' the loaded file.

OPTIONS_DeleteButton_TextContent.description: TextContent of the button to delete the selected entry from the list.

OPTIONS_DetailsButton_TextContent.description: TextContent of the button to show details of the selected entry.

OPTIONS_DownloadLink_TextContent.description: TextContent of the link (a) to download the save-file.

OPTIONS_ListInfo_TextContent.description: TextContent of the info/header above the list of saved entries.
OPTIONS_ListInfo_TextContent.message: Titel, welche derzeit auf www.save.tv versteckt werden:

OPTIONS_ManageEntry_TextContent.description: TextContent of the info/header above the actions for the selected entry.

OPTIONS_ManageEntryTitleLabel_TextConten.description: TextContent of the label for the display of the title for the selected entry.

OPTIONS_ManageAllEntries_TextContent.description: TextContent of the info/header above the actions for all entries.

OPTIONS_ClearAllowedLabel_TextContent.description: TextContent of the label to allow/activate the clear function.

OPTIONS_NotifyChangeMessage.description: Message that is shown after changing the list (clear, delete, etc.).
OPTIONS_NotifyChangeMessage.message: Die Liste wurde verändert, bitte www.save.tv neu aufrufen.

OPTIONS_NotifyLoadMessage.description: Message that is shown after loading.
OPTIONS_NotifyLoadMessage.message: Die Liste wurde erfolgreich geladen, bitte www.save.tv neu aufrufen.
